articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indonesian Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indonesian Party Leader

					Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					It was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Megawati Soekarnoputri on Thursday.

articles.title: Greetings to Nicaraguan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Nicaraguan President

					Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting on Thursday to Daniel Ortega Saavedra, president of Nicaragua, on the 190th anniversary of its independence.
					
					Kim, in the message, noted the government and people of Nicaragua have achieved great successes in the struggle to further consolidate the independence of the country and achieve social progress and development.
					
					The message wished friendly Nicaragua prosperity, expressing hope that the president and government of Nicaragua would register greater successes in the work for national unity, sustainable economic development and people's welfare.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Guatemala
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Guatemala

					Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Alvaro Colom, president of Guatemala, on the 190th anniversary of its independence.
					
					Kim in the message sincerely wished the friendly people of Guatemala steady great success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country.
